ThingDef.label: joywire
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that stimulates the brain's pleasure centers. While it dramatically improves a user's mood, the blanket of happiness makes it hard to concentrate on anything real. Joywires are illegal on many worlds, and are known for destroying whole cultures. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: painstopper
ThingDef.description: A brain implant which inhibits nociception, or pain sensation. While it does allow the user to accomplish more, it turns out pain has a purpose. When you don't feel it, you can get hurt really bad really easily. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: endoskeleton stimulator
ThingDef.description: A torso implant that stimulates the overall muscles so they can operate at maximum performance. Requires implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: muscle stimulator
ThingDef.description: A muscle implant that stimulates the overall muscles so they can operate at maximum performance. Requires implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: builder AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for building. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: farmer AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for farming. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: doctor AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for doctoring. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: miner AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for mining. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: diplomat AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for diplomacy. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: tamer AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for taming. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: chef AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for cooking. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: hunter AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for hunting. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: basic labor AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for basic unskilled labor. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: appetite suppressant
ThingDef.description: A stomach implant that suppres hungry. Requires implants research before installing.
